languages.text: "Мы не сдвинемся с места, пока дитя не вернется в дом. Готовьтесь к бою!"

traits.locale_text: "Мы не сдвинемся с места, пока дитя не вернется в дом. Готовьтесь к бою!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"
languages.original_text: "Мы не сдвинемся с места, пока дитя не вернется в дом. Готовьтесь к бою!"

traits.locale_text: "We won't move until the child is returned to the house. To battle!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “除非那孩子回到我们家族，否则我们哪都不去！准备战斗！”
languages.original_text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"

traits.locale_text: “除非那孩子回到我们家族，否则我们哪都不去！准备战斗！”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «No cederemos ni un ápice hasta que la niña vuelva a su casa. ¡A las armas!».
languages.original_text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"

traits.locale_text: «No cederemos ni un ápice hasta que la niña vuelva a su casa. ¡A las armas!».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「我々は子供を家に取り戻すまで一歩も動かぬぞ。戦うのだ！」
languages.original_text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「我々は子供を家に取り戻すまで一歩も動かぬぞ。戦うのだ！」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Wir werden uns keinen Zoll rühren, bis das Kind dem Haus zurückgegeben wird. In die Schlacht!"
languages.original_text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden uns keinen Zoll rühren, bis das Kind dem Haus zurückgegeben wird. In die Schlacht!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Nous ne bougerons pas d'un pouce tant que l'Enfant ne nous sera pas rendue. Aux armes ! »
languages.original_text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne bougerons pas d'un pouce tant que l'enfant ne nous sera pas rendu. Aux armes ! »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Çocuk, Hane'ye iade edilene kadar yerimizden kıpırdamayacağız. Savaşa!"
languages.original_text: "We will not move an inch until the child is returned to the House. To battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Çocuk Hane'ye iade edilene kadar yerimizden kıpırdamayacağız. Savaşa!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
